h: Doctor dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 30-year-old doctor was killed after an RTV hit his scooter in the Okhla area, police said on Sunday, adding the accused driver has been arrested.

h: 2 dead, 4 injured in road crash in Delhi's Welcome area
sub_h: Two helpers of a truck were killed and four people got injured after another truck hit the stationary vehicle in northeast Delhi's Welcome area in the early hours of Thursday, police said. According to police, the incident took place around 12.30am on Thursday on the flyover near Welcome Metro Station.

h: Woman in BMW kills man in 4am accident in Delhi's Moti Nagar, held
sub_h: A 36-year-old man was killed after his scooter was hit by a speeding car in west Delhi's Moti Nagar early on Sunday. The police have arrested the woman who was driving the car and seized the vehicle, a black BMW.

h: Helmets can halve Road accident death risk: Doctors
sub_h: The majority of deaths in Road accidents are preventable by following four rules such as wearing seat belts, helmets, having cars with airbags and following traffic etiquette, doctors have said.

h: Trader, labourer die in 2 separate Road accidents in Delhi
sub_h: A trader and a labourer died in separate Road accidents in north and west Delhi on Sunday.

h: 2 dead as car hits scooter, drags rider for 350 metre in Delhi; 5 held
sub_h: Two scooter riders died after a car collided head-on with their vehicle in Delhi's Keshav Puram and drove on, dragging along for a distance one of its two riders, whose head got stuck between its mangled bonnet and the windshield.

h: Minor girl killed in Road accident in Delhi, IAF officer's son held
sub_h: Police reached the Ram Manohar Lohia hospital after receiving information about the accident of the girl, a resident of Arjun Vihar in Delhi Cantt, a senior police officer said. He added that the girl was declared dead on reaching the health facility.

h: Delhi HC to cops: Is there an SOP for Road accident cases?
sub_h: Delhi High Court on Friday asked the city police chief to inform it if there was any standard operating procedure (SOP) being followed in Road accident cases.

h: Delhi: Healthy, but not safe? 42% rise in cyclists’ deaths in Road accidents
sub_h: With yet another cyclist falling prey to unsafe city roads, there was an outrage in the social media on Sunday as people demanded strict action against the offending driver.

h: Delhi: 3 die in separate Road accidents
sub_h: Three people died in separate Road accidents in the city

h: Road accidents to blame for maximum trauma injuries in men
sub_h: The majority of men taken to emergency trauma centres in hospitals are victims of injuries sustained in traffic incidents while the cause of most women being brought to such centres is falls on the road. This was established by a study carried out by the trauma departments of four premier hospitals of the country.

h: Delhi: All fatal Road accidents to be analysed
sub_h: To bring down the number of injuries and deaths caused by Road accidents, every fatal crash will now be thoroughly investigated and district-level safety plans will be developed.

h: Delhi: Auto driver accused of harassing woman dies in Road accident while fleeing from police
sub_h: Constables Rakesh, Prem and Naresh went with her to Vidhan Sabha metro station and found the autorickshaw driver, who was in an inebriated condition, there. They asked him to come with them to the police station, he said.

h: Three dead, two injured in car-bike collision in Delhi's Shakarpur
sub_h: Three people died and two others suffered injuries in a high-impact crash involving a car and a motorcycle that caused the four-wheeler to overturn in east Delhi's Shakarpur area on Sunday.

h: One school student killed, two injured after car hits them in Delhi's Paschim Vihar
sub_h: An 18-year-old girl died while two others sustained injuries after they were hit by a car in outer Delhi's Paschim Vihar area on Wednesday morning.

h: Lodhi Road accident: Homeless, we live & die on streets, says kin
sub_h: Even in her worst nightmare, 30-year-old Abida couldn’t have imagined that her children, with whom she was playing before going to sleep on June 9, would die in a few hours. In the early hours of June 10, Amir (10) and her sister Roshini (6) died when a WagonR crushed them after it was hit by a BMW car near the Lodhi Road flyover.

h: Delhi saw 2,300 accidents in first 5 months of 2022; 505 people killed: Police data
sub_h: Delhi witnessed 2,300 accidents in which over 500 people lost lives in the first five months of 2022, according to official data.Out of these, 495 were fatal accidents, 1,762 simple accidents and 43 non-injury accidents.

h: Delhi: Man absconding in Road accident case arrested
Man killed, another injured in Road accident in east Delhi
Cyclist dies in Road accident in northwest Delhi
sub_h: Ramyash, resident of northwest Delhi's Siraspur area, was a machine operator at a cold storage in Azadpur area, they said.

h: Man dies in accident on AIIMS flyover
Pedestrians, bikers biggest victims of Road accidents in Delhi in 2021
sub_h: Pedestrians and two-wheeler riders were the biggest victims of Road accidents in the city last year, Delhi Traffic Police data has revealed. Most of the accidents were caused by private cars and heavy transport vehicles. The total number of s saw a rise of around 12% in 2021 compared with the previous year.

h: Delhi: Azadpur & Punjabi Bagh Chowk among accident black spots
sub_h: The Outer and the Inner Ring Roads in Delhi witnessed the highest Road accidents and fatalities last year. While the Inner Ring Road witnessed the highest 287 accidents with 88 deaths, the Outer Ring Road saw the highest fatalities with 100 people killed in 256 accidents, shows data shared by Delhi Traffic Police.

h: How to help an accident victim? Teach kids at school, urges one
sub_h: An accident on the Jawaharlal Nehru University campus a decade ago changed Harry Singh’s world. Singh, now 30, was paralysed below the waist. On the eve of World Day of Remembrance for Road Traffic Victims on Saturday, Singh highlighted the importance of how to deal with an accident victim.

h: Cab driver dead in Road accident in Delhi
sub_h: A cab driver died after his vehicle was hit from behind by a car driven by a Delhi Police constable under the Barapulla flyover in the south-eastern part of the city, officials said on Saturday.

h: Deaths in Delhi caused by Road accidents increased in 2021 as compared to 2020, says police commissioner Rakesh Asthana
sub_h: Asthana further said that the cases registered against women also increased in the year 2021 as compared to the year 2020.

h: One killed, another injured after being hit by car in Delhi's Daryaganj
sub_h: A 55-year-old man died and another was grievously injured after being hit by a cab in central Delhi's Daryaganj area early on Thursday morning, police said.

h: One killed, four injured after truck hits wall in southwest Delhi's Vasant Kunj
sub_h: A 12-year-old boy was killed while four children were injured after a truck rammed into the boundary wall of a plot in southwest Delhi's Vasant Kunj area, police said on Tuesday.

h: Burari on top of Road accident chart, West Delhi reports worst affected areas
sub_h: Some of the worst areas in terms of Road accidents are in west Delhi. However, the locality with the maximum number of Road accidents reported in 2019 was Burari in north Delhi with 282 accidents.

h: Delhi: Police resolve fatal accident case in 10 days, get kin Rs 32 lakh
sub_h: In a first, Delhi Police resolved a case of compensation for a Road accident within 10 days. By filing a Fast Detailed Accident Report (FDAR), the family of the deceased received Rs 32 lakh as compensation.

h: Delhi: 12-year-old boy killed in Majnu ka Tila Road accident
sub_h: A 12-year-old boy died after being hit by a tempo in north Delhi's Majnu ka Tila on Monday, police said.

h: Fatal Road accidents see 19% decline
12 injured as bus crashes into tree in Delhi's New Friends Colony
sub_h: Twelve people were injured on Saturday after an Uttar Pradesh Roadways bus crashed into a tree at the New Friends Colony in Delhi.

h: Man riding scooter killed after being hit by speeding car in south Delhi
sub_h: A man was killed allegedly after a speeding Mercedes car hit his scooter in Vasant Vihar here on Thursday, police said on Friday.

h: Road accidents see spurt as Delhi slowly unlocks
sub_h: Easing of lockdown rules triggered a spurt in the number of Road accidents in the national capital. Delhi saw nearly 150% increase in the number of Road accidents in the month of May compared with April.

h: Delhi govt’s Road accident scheme has saved over 10,000 lives: Arvind Kejriwal
sub_h: Chief minister Arvind Kejriwal on Saturday said more than 10,000 lives have been saved under ‘Farishte Dilli Ke Scheme’, which is designed to help victims of Road accidents.

h: One dead, two injured after tempo collides with truck in Delhi
sub_h: A person lost his life and two others were injured in an accident when a tempo collided with a stationary truck at Nehru Place flyover in the national capital on Sunday morning, the police said.

h: Delhi: How Road accidents are leaving survivors with an uphill task
sub_h: or Harry Singh, life turned upside down when he met with an accident as a student. On International Day of Disabled Persons, Singh recalled when, as a 20-year-old studying Russian at Jawaharlal Nehru University, he collided with a car and he was flung to the pedestrian walkway. He is paralysed from the waist down. Apart from being a research scholar, he also has a startup, but says life has never been the same again.

h: Driver of cluster bus arrested for killing man while driving drunk
sub_h: A 45-year-old driver of a cluster bus was arrested five days after he allegedly killed a man while driving in an inebriated condition near Kashmere Gate metro station, police said on Wednesday.

h: One killed, 1 hurt in Road accident while returning from office party in Dwarka: Police
Three injured as cluster bus mows down seven vehicles on Delhi-Meerut Expressway
sub_h: A speeding cluster bus damaged seven vehicles and injured three men near the Khel Gaon bus stop on Delhi-Meerut Expressway (NH-9) on Wednesday evening. The bus driver, however, managed to flee. This incident has yet again brought to the fore the need to rein in rogue cluster bus drivers.

h: Wrong-lane crash at Barapullah flyover kills executive, cousin critical
sub_h: A 36-year-old executive at a multinational firm was killed while his 33-year-old cousin was battling for life after the scooty they were riding, on the wrong lane, crashed into the side rails, throwing them off the Barapullah flyover near Sarai Kale Khan on Saturday evening.

h: Delhi: Tribunal awards Rs 17 lakh to Road accident victims
sub_h: A Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT) has awarded over Rs 17 lakh as compensation to the victims of a 2015 Road accident, which had left a 20-year-old man dead and two others injured in Najafgarh.

h: Man killed by speeding truck in Delhi's Punjabi Bagh
sub_h: A 30-year-old man was mowed down by a speeding truck in west Delhi's Punjabi Bagh area, police said on Friday. The truck driver was arrested and the vehicle seized, they added.

h: Delhi recorded a death in Road accidents every five hours last year
sub_h: Of every 10 fatal Road accidents in Indian cities with a population of over one million, one is in Delhi. The toll in the city hit the highest mark in the past five years in 2018. According to an accident report brought out by the Union ministry of road transport and highways, Delhi suffered a road death almost every five hours last year.

h: Three killed as truck rams into car in Delhi
sub_h: Three men were mowed down while one got injured after a speeding truck rammed into a car in southeast Delhi, police said on Monday. Police said they received information at around 11 pm on Sunday regarding the incident on Maa Anand Mai Marg near Indira Kalyan Vihar Okhla Phase -I.
